document_data.name: Ironhar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ironhar''' was the biggest of the "Royal Keeps" of [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]], as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Background: Ironhar was home to several wealthy collectors, who often hired adventurers to explore old ruins in eastern Eskorn, and to retrieve old relics for them.
document_data.Notable inhabitants: * [[Dramar Lornen]], a collector obsessed with the [[Dawn Titan's Spire]].
